label: Standard dev. of read cov
tooltip: standard deviation of the read coverage in the set of genes annotated on the given contig

label: Pearson
tooltip: Pearsonâ€™s correlation coefficient for the tetranucleotide-derived z-score vectors of the given contig and the overall assembly

label: correl. p-value
tooltip: probability (p-value) for two random sequences to show a correlation that is at least as high as 'c_pearson_r'

label: Gene len deviation
tooltip: extent to which 'g_len' deviates from the corresponding c_genelenm, in units of 'c_genelensd'

label: Gene len deviation from avg. g len
Deviation of read cov (gene)
tooltip: standard deviation of the read coverage along the given gene

label: Mean gene cov. dev.
tooltip: extent to which 'g_cov' deviates from the corresponding 'c_genecovm', in units of 'c_genecovsd'

label: Gene cov. dev. from avg. gene dev.
tooltip: extent to which 'g_cov' deviates from the average gene coverage in the assembly, in units of the coverage SD over the complete set of genes in this assembly

label: GC content deviation (contig)
tooltip: extent to which 'g_gc_cont' deviates from the mean gene GC content, in units of GC SD over the set of genes on the corresponding contig

label: p of correlation...
tooltip: probability (p-value) for two random sequences to show a correlation that is at least as high as 'g_pearson_r_c'

label: Variation of c_covdev from ass. cov.
tooltip: extent to which 'c_cov' deviates from the mean assembly coverage, in units of total assembly coverage SD

label: p of a random... (g_pearson_p_o)
tooltip: probability (p-value) of a random data set to show a correlation with the overall assembly composition that is at least as high as 'g_pearson_r_o'

label: Pearsons coefficient tetranucleotide-derived z-score
tooltip: Pearson's correlation coefficient for the tetranucleotide-derived z-score vectors of the given gene and the overall assembly

label: Pearson coefficient tetranucleotide-derived z-score vectors ...
tooltip: Pearson's correlation coefficient for the tetranucleotide-derived z-score vectors of the given gene and its respective contig

label: 'g_gc_cont' deviation from mean gene GC content
tooltip: Extent to which 'g_gc_cont' deviates from the mean gene GC content, in units of GC SD over the set of genes on the corresponding contig

label: LCA ID
tooltip: NCBI ID LCA of hits in 10% score range of best hit
